Class Payment

java.lang.Object
edu.tamu.csce331.sharetea.models.Payment
public class Payment extends Object
Payment model representing payment transactions in the Sharetea POS system.

This class encapsulates payment information for customer orders, including payment method, amount, transaction references, and timing information. Payments are linked to specific orders and support various payment methods such as cash, credit card, and digital payments.

Key features:

  • Payment method tracking and validation
  • Transaction amount and reference management
  • Payment timing and audit trail support
  • Order linkage for transaction history
Since:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • Payment

      public Payment()
      Default constructor for Payment.

      Creates a new Payment instance with default values. This constructor is typically used when creating new payment records that will be populated with data from payment processing operations.

    • Payment

      public Payment(Long orderId, BigDecimal amount, String method)
      Constructs a Payment with specified order and amount information.

      This constructor is used when creating a Payment with known order and payment details. The paidAt timestamp is automatically set to the current time.

      Parameters:
      orderId - the identifier of the order this payment is for
      amount - the amount of the payment
      method - the payment method used
